channel.title: RSS feed for tag haproxyon Raymii.org
channel.description: RSS feed for tag haproxyon Raymii.org

item.title: haproxy: intercept all cookies and set secure attribute
item.description: This snippet shows you how to use haproxy to set the secure attribute on cookies. You might have a backend application which is not able to set the secure attribute on cookies or for which haproxy does the ssl offloading. This simple frontend rspirep sets the secure attribute for all cookies.

item.title: haproxy: client side ssl certificates
item.description: This tutorial shows you how to configure haproxy and client side ssl certificates. It features a few comprehensive examples.

item.title: haproxy: set specific ssl ciphers
item.description: This snippet shows you how to set specific ciphers for haproxy when using an ssl frontend.

item.title: haproxy: add strict transport security or any other http header
item.description: This snippet shows you how to add a header to a haproxy response, for example, the HSTS header (http strict transport security).

item.title: haproxy: ssl backends
item.description: This snippet shows you how to configure an ssl backend on haproxy 1.5 or higher.

item.title: haproxy: redirect to ssl or other website
item.description: This snippet shows you how to use haproxy to redirect http traffic to https or any other website

item.title: haproxy: restrict specific URLs to specific IP addresses
item.description: This snippet shows you how to use haproxy to restrict certain URLs to certain IP addresses. For example, to make sure your admin interface can only be accessed from your company IP address.
